website_summaries.verdict: This dual camera system is packed with features, many that are revamped to provide better monitoring and reliability than previous models.
pros: An updated model that sports the features and capabilities parents love in a baby monitor: 2 cameras, wide angle viewing on the vivid 5" monitor with splint screen capability, sensitive mic, and infrared function
cons: A few owners gripe about issues downloading the app, as well as drops in WiFi connection

customer_reviews.title: Do you hate sleeping? Then purchase this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Being a parent of a baby who wakes you up in the middle of the night is hard, having a monitor that wakes you up more than the baby makes you postal. If I could give this no stars I would. It loses reception 4-5 times a night and blares an alarm. The camera is less than 8 feet away from the parent unit and still disconnects ALL THE TIME. We thought we’d splurge for an expensive camera so we wouldn’t have to buy another one again down the road, big mistake. Don’t do it. Listen to the reviews. This is our fourth monitor overall and the WORST one we’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Ahern

customer_reviews.title: User-friendly, a lot of options
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We added a second camera and it is very user-friendly and has maintained the images. I have yet to set up the Wi-Fi option, I have not needed to, but I like that I can do that as well. That is why we opted for this product over others, as well as it came highly recommended by a couple other people. I'm not sure why it does not have better reviews overall!
customer_reviews.author: Ilisa Ailts

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I loved it once I opened the box! It has the biggest screen device if had for a monitor, the app is easy and set up was so easy. It’s the best deal for your buck. With the screen and app it was hard to find both. And it alerts me on sensorys and temp. I can talk to him play music, record and take pictures etc. the features are endless!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I just love this
customer_reviews.text: Despite the surprisingly bad reviews, we listen to some close family members and friends and they loved their Motorola baby cams. We liked this one because there is an option to use either the phone app or the included monitor. They both work well, no connection issues and my husband and I can be in different rooms and both watch on our devices. Also the super adjustable stand is helpful. Just wish battery life was better on the camera and monitor
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely was a pain to figure out how to connect it to my phone but that was purely user error and pregnancy brain lol. I bought this early because I wanted to test it out I have been using it to watch my dog lol. It’s been amazing it definitely lags with the phone rather then monitor itself but I am miles away from my home and it still works amazing! I was discouraged from getting this because of all the bad reviews but several of my friends have the model before this and LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We are in love with it! It just works great and helps us a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Heloisa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor!
customer_reviews.text: We literally went through 4 other monitors before finding this one. It puts all others to shame. It is perfect for what we need. It shows temperature, has the WiFi with the app, and the battery life is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: LauRob

customer_reviews.title: Love this baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this baby monitor!! It's great having a handheld monitor and an app on your phone. The picture and sound are both good quality. Highly recommend this for peace of mind for all parents.
customer_reviews.author: Hskrgrl

customer_reviews.title: 4 starz
customer_reviews.text: It's very good just the battery in cámara dosent last long
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Camera will not power on
customer_reviews.text: Camera will not stay on - loses connection which results in loud beeping throughout the night. Now I cannot even get the camera to power on. Had this unit less than a year and just moved my son to a toddler bed (so really need the monitor to work properly) . Extremely disappointed with the quality of this after spending this amount of money. When it worked, the quality was good - but unfortunately does not work less than a year after purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had this monitor for 6 months and have had no problems. The image is a good as one would need. Sound is great. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: MRSFO

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: I have to brag on Motorola for a minute. I absolutely love this baby monitor system, but today I had to call their customer service line because I have been having an issue with my WiFi baby cams dropping signal to the monitor. So, I mentally prepared myself to be ready to spend an extended amount of time on the phone and for the typical “talk in circles,” nightmare customer service call, however, I was pleasantly surprised! Not only was the customer service rep super kind, she resolved my issue in less that 10mins, which resulted in them sending me two new cameras FREE OF CHARGE! Wow!! Walk about great customer service and one happy mama!!
customer_reviews.author: M Ellen Martin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best monitor. The range is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor. The range is amazing, it holds its charge for a very long time, and the camera is super clear!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey  Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. It is the only system that I could find that had two cameras, a monitor and WiFi. I seldom leave reviews, but it’s a terrible system! The picture quality terrible. The range says 1000ft, but it would go three rooms away in a wooden house. Sound on full volume is really quiet. You have to have both cameras on for it to function. Our old summer monitor works a million times better. We will be getting another system and simply have two monitors for our two kids.
customer_reviews.author: fesneurad

customer_reviews.title: Listen to Reviews- DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: WiFi ability is only accessible through the Hubble App, meaning the monitor only works for the traditional radio frequency. The main issue is that the radio frequency doesn’t work well AT ALL. I was woken up 4 times in one night because the camera and monitor connection was lost. My camera is across the hall less than 45 ft from the monitor that is supposed to reach 1000 ft. We should have listened to the previous reviews saying that this camera system was a bust. Returned and got the regular motorola monitors (no WiFi) and they connect just fine.
customer_reviews.author: A Short

customer_reviews.title: No split screen feature - false advertising!
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement. This monitor is advertised to have a split screen feature. Even the images on the box are of a 50/50 split screen, which is why we purchased this. However, this feature does not exist on the monitor - at all. Preparing to return it and order a different brand that actually does what it says it will do. Highly disappointed as we loved our other Motorola baby monitor with the single camera. 10/10 would not recommend this one if you’re purchasing it to keep an eye on two babies.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Handley-Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor . Very happy with it .
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my new grand baby and it works great ! Night vision could be improved in my opinion but this is the one my daughter in law registered and price was better here than other stores . Sound is great and you can hear her move if you have it turned up to the max but it is rarely needed to do so . I love it has a camera for both ends of the baby bed , and the charge on the monitor lasts a long Time . Definitely worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Mm1117

customer_reviews.title: Faulty charging
customer_reviews.text: Been using this monitor for about two months, and now all of a sudden the charger only works when twisted at a sudden angle. The monitor is not beat up in any way, shape or form, it is treated with care and is in perfect condition. However, it is unacceptable that after two months of use I am having difficulties ensuring that the device is getting a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle N.

customer_reviews.title: Product dies quickly
customer_reviews.text: In about six months, the infrared stopped working. The parent unit constantly loses contact with the cameras, which then sounds a loud and annoying alarm, then reconnects to the camera, but not before waking you up for the fifth time in a night. This is the second (newer) version of this camera/monitor I’ve owned. I thought the newer would have fixed the reliability issues but apparently not. The first version I had completely stopped working on three different cameras. Don’t buy this camera. It’s expensive and doesn’t last.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase if you value sleep
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great in almost every way except that the alarm on it goes off ALL NIGHT. It’s been 3 months and if I could return it I would. I’m not sure why the alarm goes off, but based on other reviews I think it’s because it disconnects from the WiFi. We have a 2 year old and 3 month old twins. I don’t need help waking up in the middle of the night.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable! DO NOT BIY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I could care less of the picture quality because all I wanted was a monitor that worked. I’ve had endless problems with this as it constantly disconnects signal. Piece of crap and extremely over priced for the horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I’d give these cameras zero stars if it let me. The cameras are constantly offline, regardless of being plugged in to a power source and well within WiFi range. The cameras would disconnect in the middle of the night and beep at us. When we reached out to customer support regarding our issues, they talked down to us as if we didn’t know to have the cameras plugged in or connected to WiFi - and never provided a solution for us. Our troubles didn’t begin until after the return window had passed, so returning it wasn’t an option. Don’t buy this camera set!!!
customer_reviews.author: IreneAOK

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THIS MONITOR
customer_reviews.text: I have given this monitor A YEAR! And without a doubt I can say this is the worst thing I have ever had in my entire life! The coneccion between cameras and monitor is so bad I can’t even start! When it looses coneccion (4 or 5 times per night) It beeps so LOUD that IT WAKES MY BABY! The batteries dont last! I have to leave the cameras and the monitor connected so it can work more than an hour! It is a pretty expensive monitor so you would imagine it will be good, BUT NO! Don’t waste your money with this one
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Gomez

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice big screen but not worth it for the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Best Buy last year and in less than 1yr I have had many problems. It loses signal all the time. I returned through the insurance I bought bc they couldn’t fix . Then I bought from this seller and let me tell you the camera isn’t as clear and there’s always lines passing by the camera. I’m super disappointed I wasn’t expecting to have this bad experience the second time
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Castellon

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Didn't connect then wouldn't stay connected. Hated the picture quality. When they disconnect the sound is so annoying. Bought the older model and it's AMAZING. How can a newer model fail SO hard?!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bear

customer_reviews.title: Very good wifi baby monitor with a phone app
customer_reviews.text: This is my second motorola baby monitor. I had a previous version for two years before buying this one, but we had another baby so had to buy another. My favorite feature is checking my baby in the Hubble app while I'm not home. The least favorite one is that the monitor can't be too far from the camara because it looses signal. I would recommend this if you don't have a big home.
customer_reviews.author: EnslyG

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but not worth 250$ at all!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is cheap. Battery, camera, monitor, picture.... But this is the only one could offer both wireless and parent unit. The real value should be somthing less than 80$. You know, Amazon dont care if they ripp you off cause nobody checks the quality. I am wondering how they came up with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sanaz

customer_reviews.title: Chargers suck
customer_reviews.text: The charger sucks! There’s a white piece close to the part that attaches to the monitor itself. The white piece is heavy so charger pulls out and then monitor doesn’t work. Constantly turns off then I have to go back in room and mess with it to get it to work again. When the monitor actually works the picture and sound are great! But that’s the things is it rarely ever works properly because it has to be plugged in and the chargers don’t work
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Monitor will not stay connected
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera when it works. I like the ability to connect via wifi and check in. The monitor will not stay connected. It is always disconnecting even when you are just on the other side of a wall from the camera. The camera has also started to get grainy and fuzzy at the bottom of the picture. Very disappointing because now I have to figure out another way to monitor my babys. If there is any way to fix these issue please let me know, but until then this camera is not recommended from me.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Basham

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced monitor, disconnects all the time and its not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The monitor's box shows a split screen feature (the very reason why we bought this monitor), what we have is a picture-in-picture monitor, where one baby will take the whole screen and the other one will take a small part of the screen, on top of the first. Plus this monitor disconnected in the middle of the night with no apparent reason (it was plugged in so the battery was not the issue). This is just a poor quality monitor. We went back to having two independent monitors for our babies of a cheaper brand (HelloBaby), this monitor have not failed us once in almost two years.
customer_reviews.author: Ugo Sangiorgi

customer_reviews.title: Random Disconnects
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Motorola products so I thought I would ignore the low-star reviews on this product. That was a mistake. While the picture quality and night vision features are nice, this product has a MAJOR flaw. It randomly disconnects during the night and sets off a HORRIBLE "nuclear meltdown" worthy alarm that is almost impossible to turn off. Then it also causes a beep on the CHILD unit when it eventually reconnects. So after that, you now have awake parents and baby. Buyer beware. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless Parent

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras and no connection issues
customer_reviews.text: Cameras are great. Had no issues with camera network connection (Wifi or otherwise). Nightmode works well, picture quality is high, and love the ability to access via mobile app. Only issue is the system doesn't appear to have a true "splitscreen" for 2 cameras, it is more a picture in picture mode with ine large screen and a smaller view of the second. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this if you like to sleep at night
customer_reviews.text: If you want to sleep during the night do not buy this. It randomly likes to lose signal between 2-4am and have an alarm go off to let you know. Now besides getting a lot less sleep since buying this, every thing else about the monitor is great. I'm beginning to wonder if Motorola has anybody working for them that is a parent??? I would like to know why someone would design an obnoxious beep that goes off that doesn't have a off/silent button to avoid having to hear that at night!
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Yuhas

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been on several rod trips and switches from room to room. Definitely needs the 5 point attachment but worth every penny. I wouldn’t have survived Ferber method without it and it’s given me some of my life back. I can feel better about leaving my baby to sleep in his crib
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Bad picture/no connection
customer_reviews.text: If it’s cloudy outside, the monitor can’t tell if it should be in night mode or day mode so sometimes the screen is so dark it’s useless. I’ve tried to change the brightness and it doesn’t make a difference. As for sound, it actually doesn’t pick up the tiny little noises(which I prefer) so that’s nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great product until camera broke not even a month after getting it
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor at first, but not even a month after buying it one of the cameras starting messing up. It’s blurry or out of focus and has some figures on it! Other than this I have loved it. But now I want to return because it hasn’t even been a month and the camera is already messing up. And I need a two camera monitor system. I thought about buying another camera but would rather just return and get my money back instead of paying more money for another camera to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Britten

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay charged
customer_reviews.text: We have twins and wanted a camera for each baby. One of the cameras won’t stay plugged in so in the middle of the night it will start beeping at us and wake us up. We also have had a problem with the monitor staying plugged in so it won’t charged. I’m not sure if we just got a defective item or if that’s a common problem with this camera and monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Kate LeAnn Brown

customer_reviews.title: Viewing cuts out! Biggest disappointment
customer_reviews.text: We love so many features about this monitor. The large viewing screen and the wonderful app! There is a sound/picture delay, however it does the job. We returned one additional camera due to it cutting out. But the additional camera we purchased also cuts out and so does the original! When the camera cuts out the monitor beeps and SO DOES the camera! Which may wake baby! We are also disappointed that the function to speak into the monitor so baby can hear in their room does not work at all! The music function doesn’t work either.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Remillard

customer_reviews.title: very good looking and hand held screen last long on battery ...
customer_reviews.text: very good looking and hand held screen last long on battery alone, love the faCT I can also view on any phone, only problem I have is one cord is now causing a loose fit on one of the cameras so charging is speratic, going to contact Motorola to see if they will address my issue will update post after to tell how customer service is
customer_reviews.author: Christie M. Irving

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Video Baby Monitor – Motorola and after only 7 months it, simply, doesn’t work anymore. The camera does not communicate with the display monitor (nor with the cell phone application). The pairing is no longer occuring and the blue led, that is located in the front, indicating the camera is connected is so weak, compared to what it was in the beginning. The problem appeared out of a sudden. It was working properly and, without a reason, stopped. I live in Brazil and the Technical Support Team states that this problem has no solution, and so, the infant monitor became useless withing a year.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio

customer_reviews.title: Big Monitor problem. Dies in less than 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: After using this system for 1 year 6 months, the monitor decided to be funky. Pls look at attached pic. I proceeded to email Motorola Binatone for a fix or if I can just buy another monitor to replace this. They just said to try and reset it and if it’s under warranty, send it back to them Of course it’s not it’s been over a year. And I can’t buy JUST the monitor when I have 3 of the cameras at home ? I have to buy another set ? And... collect dust ?
customer_reviews.author: denn23

customer_reviews.title: Go with another brand
customer_reviews.text: Not a good brand, when I received it it worked great, then 2 days later the unit wouldn't pair with the cameras, and the picture was lagging. I contacted amazon and sent back the item and they gave me my refund. I went ahead and purchased the Summer Infant brand, and it works great. The one I purchased was $188. I had the Summer Infant brand with my first child and it lasted 4 yrs before giving out. The brand lasts a long time and is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has been outstanding. We’ve had 3 different monitors for our kids and this has been the favorite for a number of reasons. It’s easy to set up, good picture, and we LOVE the ability to view remotely on the app. It’s been completely reliable since we bought it in 2018. This is the first review I’ve ever written on amazon but I felt compelled because it’s been so great and has marginal reviews. I’d 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hear...piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The set up of this product was quick and easy. The picture quality is fine and allows you to see your child at night. I would have loved to give this a higher rating but the sound quality is so poor you can’t hear your child crying when the volume is all the way up. I was awake next to the monitor and my daughter was crying and we could not hear the monitor. If we had been asleep we would have slept through her cries.
customer_reviews.author: Mark V

customer_reviews.title: ... range goes in and out sometimes but been a great monitor system for us with two kids now
customer_reviews.text: The range goes in and out sometimes but been a great monitor system for us with two kids now. The phone app is great too. Live stream is quick and the picture taking option is quick.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Gordon

customer_reviews.title: The worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for my son's room, when I arrived, I didnt open it until the birth was near and surprise! 1 of the 2 cameras doesnt work ... i can't even connect to the mobile application. The monitor that it includes is seen in black and white and the image is pixelated and of low quality .. sometimes there are lines and i cant see anything at all. I do not have a clear view of either of the two cameras by that means. Unfortunately the time has passed for the return, I lost my money making this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: alonso

customer_reviews.title: So far good
customer_reviews.text: Very good choice for baby camera but maybe the range of the coverage will be affected by Building insulator.. also the camera application needs some improvement.. many times the streaming will stop suddenly due to lack of network even if the router is emmediately next to the camera. I’m not sure if the issue from the camera of from the application itself . Otherwise it is good so far
customer_reviews.author: Nouf Alfalah

customer_reviews.title: Best baby monitor with classic Interface and Internet access
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor with web access via the app. Supports upto four monitors. It should be noted that the cameras still use micro USB for charging but the monitor now uses a 5v barrel connector. I don't know the dimensions of the inner and outer diameter of the barrel but will update port later a compatable plug.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Will only bring you pain
customer_reviews.text: It was fine when it worked, but it only works SOMETIMES. The video connection is faulty so you will randomly lose functionality at any time of the day or night. Then you’ll get a very loud, annoying beep to add to your frustration, and probably wake yoursleeping baby. If I could give this zero stars, I would. Can’t get a hold of customer service so I just had to buy a different one. I can’t even give this away, because who wants a monitor that only works once in a while? Save yourself the aggravation and buy the Infant Optics.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t do what it’s supposed to do reliably
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage - always disconnects and beeps in the baby’s room and our room, all the time. So much potential - such garbage execution. Really terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: dnlien

customer_reviews.title: Poor charging
customer_reviews.text: I really only started using this monitor 2 months ago when my baby started napping in her room. And even more about a month ago when she started sleeping in her room. The charger is very finicky and if you so much as breath in its direction, the monitor won't charge. It is very unreliable when we wake up in the middle of the night and the monitor is off and who knows how long the baby has been crying for.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: We have to re install the whole thing every time, terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of money. This camera's battery is very bad it simply does not work if is not attached to the cable which has an annoying false contact (my sister's had the same problem). But the worst part is when you have to leave home because the hubble app is SO so bad, seriously we have to reinstall the camera every single time and the process to do that is such a pain. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MRA

customer_reviews.title: Too dark.  and sound too low.
customer_reviews.text: Could not hear anything even with volume all the way up. Could not connect to phone. Screen too dark even with brightness all the way up. Not worth the price at all
customer_reviews.author: TruthSpeaker

customer_reviews.title: Terrible connection
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst baby monitor I have owned. Never works, constantly needs to be “re-paired” multiple times a day- I tried to return and now I am not able to, so $250+ wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Always disconnects
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible. It doesn’t hook up to the internet well, it doesn’t even hook up to it’s own monitor well. it always disconnects or just shuts off so you turn on the monitor and it just beeps at you very loudly. It only came with one camera when it’s advertised as two. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! there are much better, cheaper ones to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brazzil Fam

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable for away/working parent to check in on baby
customer_reviews.text: I like the range of view it provides when it works. I have 2 cameras & 1 must be defective rarely wants to work. The Hubble app sounded ideal for when I would be away but it doesn’t connect well. This product made me doubt my WiFi network but made changes & I don’t have trouble with any other devices or apps but this. Bummed I was hoping to use this as a reliable app & baby cam for when I was away more than 2 rooms away.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I Kind of Hate This Thing
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointing for such an expensive monitor. Really difficult to aim camera, horrible interference, very low quality image in night vision. I thought other reviewers were exaggerating, but they aren't. When the lights are off, I can barely see my kids. And whoever thought the beeping on the parent monitor was a good idea had clearly never slept in the same room with a baby or a spouse. This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This is the biggest price of crap ever made. Plus you can not talk to anyone at Motorola for help. Complete waste of money. Purchased August 16 and by December camera just stopped connecting to monitor for no reason. Had to trash and go buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughmark

customer_reviews.title: Audio doesn’t work after a few months.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It’s easy to use, I like that it can pan around the room. Cons: the audio and video cut out for weeks at a time, randomly, switching off from one camera to the other. I already had this unit replaced once after this started to Happen the first time. Now it’s happening again just a few months later, but it’s too late to return it now. Not sure what’s wrong with this model but it’s clearly flawed. The picture quality is also very poor at night.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Looses signal on screen saver mode
customer_reviews.text: Looses signal when screen is on screen saver mode= loud blairing beep. This is the second set amazon exchanged the first set due to the same issue, we are now on our second set. Called Motorola support their suggestion was hard reset which didn’t fix anything and then say said to just leave the screen on all the time and working on a software update. Otherwise clear picture and screen quality
customer_reviews.author: Megan Guzowski-Long

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I researched for a LONG time which monitor is best...this has not disappointed! The screen is huge, picture is so clear, and night vision is awesome! The volume on the loudest setting is not very loud, nor are the pre-set white noises, but I still rate this a 5-star product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica harrison

customer_reviews.title: not so happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: not so happy with this product. I had to buy a new one because my infant summer broke after it was tossed by LO. I cannot really see my child on this monitor. The range is not much and it does not pick up the sound as good as my previous infant summer.
customer_reviews.author: Franziska Adkins

customer_reviews.title: This monitor sucks!!
customer_reviews.text: Update: it will not pair AT ALL now. Save your money. Buy a different monitor. This monitor freezes all the time! We have to pair it to the parent unit frequently. It beeps loud and wakes my baby up every time. The 2-way mic cuts in and out. Our signal is great so I don’t know what’s wrong with it but I hate it and am ready to get another brand. Amazon, please take it back!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I’m able to watch my son on the monitor and speak  to my husband when I need to
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have this for three months and it been great to my family. I have not have any trouble with it yet. You have to read the instruction and have strong internet connection. I love it and it meet my needs . One of the best gift we got. It work anywhere in my house
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: item worked for 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: This item, which I know was an open box, had a camera that would not take a charge (power cord also would not stay connected) and the monitor began making a loud shrieking noise after I had the item for 48 hours. The noise would only stop when i turned off the volume which defeats half the purpose of the monitor to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: rosanne250

customer_reviews.title: There are better priced, more reliable units out there... keep looking nothing to see here.
customer_reviews.text: One Star because I can't rate it any lower. The units (yes, plural) we've had have all failed electronically or mechanically within a very short period of time after purchase. The first was replaced (awesome) through Amazon and had faulty plugs inside the remote camera units. Our second unit managed to hold on just past the return window before bowing out of service. Frustrating to say the least; we'll be looking at other products to replace this unreliable unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Constantly loses single in the house. Kids bedrooms are ...
customer_reviews.text: Constantly loses single in the house. Kids bedrooms are upstairs and parents is down stairs. Not very far apart. Around 25 feet
customer_reviews.author: David Pridgen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible signal and battery life
customer_reviews.text: I tried to return and buy a new one of this 4 times. I’m very disappointed, each time has a different issue, the camera battery never worked, it looses signal very often, the soubd of the parents visor I can’t barely listen. Returning it again for never again...now I’ll try a Kodak model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Its very handful, and the battery life of the monitor last several days. The mic of the monitor is the only thing i didn't like because its volume is too low and theres no way to control the volume. If you use your phone you the mic will not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Frauca

customer_reviews.title: Make the beeping stop!
customer_reviews.text: As good as this monitor is the incessant beeping that comes if one of the cameras loses its signal is unnecessary not only is it loud but it has to be manually stopped. It will jolt you awake faster than your crying baby at 2am. The beeping alone is making me return this item.
customer_reviews.author: dennis lederer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work out of box
customer_reviews.text: First impression it doesn't work. Wont pair with phone or handheld.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Had the older version and loved it. This model is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Had the older version and loved it. This model is terrible. Motorola is unresponsive and has no solution for the connectivity issues between the monitor and cameras. Now after 6 months I cannot get the monitor will not charge. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: Poor product / poorer customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have had repeated trouble with this camera, from dropping signal, to making buzzing sounds, to not being able to scan. Even more importantly customer service for replacement and repair is virtually non-existent. The last thing you want as a parent is to get stuck in the endless circle that they put you through, from needing to get case numbers that expire after 72 hours to promised call-backs that never happen.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin C. Boehm

customer_reviews.title: Not a great monitor. The screen is very grainy and connection ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a great monitor. The screen is very grainy and connection is terrible. The worst feature about this monitor is when the camara loses connection, the monitor beeps very loudly and does not stop until you click "ok." I cannot find a way to shut this feature off.
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Awful - Quit working within 5 Months of Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Would be a great set up - if it worked. The screen started going blue to white, to completely black. Reconnected, paired, restarted many times and it would work for a few hours at most before doing the same thing. Extremely frustrating and disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Erik H.

customer_reviews.title: Battery failure
customer_reviews.text: The device is generally good with a solid range. It would be nice if it had a bit higher resolution, but all in all a solid product. The issue I have is that the baby terry seems to have failed after owning it for less than 5 months...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The image is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! the image on the monitor becomes completely black if the camera location is dark but not enough to activate the infrared. the infrared is activated automatically so most of the day I can’t see anything through the monitor. The volume is not good enough for lower noises, only big noises are able to be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Krisna Jaruzo Rushansky

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this camera if you value good sleep. We bought three Motorola 855 connects just ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this camera if you value good sleep. We bought three Motorola 855 connects just to see if one of them was faulty and they kept doing the same thing. It disconnects and loses signal in the middle of the night waking you up, having to reconnect it. Our house is under 1,500 sq ft and baby’s room is very close to ours so there is NO reason for it to lose signal.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable product
customer_reviews.text: Was a very good quality product. Every thing mentioned in its product description is accurate. But down side to the product is that the camera dont mount and that the monitor is not a traditional charging port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dual view and mobile app connectivity.
customer_reviews.text: Like the dual view and mobile app connecting. Sound is too quiet, but usable. Decent battery life. Screen does not show the time, which is really disappointing, especially since a previous model we had did show the time. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Night vision isnt great.
customer_reviews.text: The night vision isnt great. It's really hard to see details.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: App does not work well
customer_reviews.text: I thought going with a reputable brand like Motorola the app would be held to the same standard. The Hubble App worked fine for about a month and then constant problems. The hand held monitor works ok however I can’t view anything from phones or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are much better options to these.
customer_reviews.text: These are garbage. The cameras will frequently lose connection or reboot despite full signal and beep extremely loud. One camera flat out broke the 2nd month- the other we have just stopped using since it loses connection so much.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great Baby Monitor for New Parents. Night vision is very good to help you see the baby in the dark. You can also use sound to hear when baby is crying.
customer_reviews.author: Pat  McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. If you want to be woken up ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. If you want to be woken up in the middle of the night when the camera looses signal to the parent unit then this is your unit. Me personally once I turn it on and am in the next room over don't want what little sleep I do get interrupted by a crappy monitor losing signal. STAY AWAY from this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Both chargers stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I like the performance of the monitor but the only thing I don’t like is that both chargers stopped working at about 3 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Georgina Ma Cantu Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is not worth the money. This is the 2nd Motorola monitor I purchased in 1 year. It works well for a few months then the monitor won’t connect to the camera. Tried calling Motorola for tech help and they aren’t helpful at all. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Wehner

customer_reviews.title: Very Low sound on Parents Unit. Can’t hear the baby.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it!!!! The product is great, but the sound is extremely low on the Parents Unit. Impossible to hear your baby crying even on the highest sound level. Very sad about that!
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Maron Gedeon

customer_reviews.title: ... I already ordered one MBP855 monitor but i’m not happy for the range can the monitor reach it
customer_reviews.text: Hello please I already ordered one MBP855 monitor but i’m not happy for the range can the monitor reach it! Like inside the house disconnect ! Is there any problems with mine ? Or the range for it is too short!! But my sister have the old one , the one without wifi , her own can reach more! Thank u
customer_reviews.author: dana borji

customer_reviews.title: it breaks easily and no warranty in brazil
customer_reviews.text: deslike strongly. watch out for the warranty. in brazil they do not cover any faults that may incur in the product. i have a broken one in my home and i bought it 7 months ago. buy another one besides this .
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Pinho de Barros Montezuma

customer_reviews.title: Its a good o option.
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good one, but the plug break too easy and the sinal some time is badly
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Graboski

customer_reviews.title: Poor range
customer_reviews.text: It has very little range. Often goes out and wakes us up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible baby monitor
customer_reviews.text: Horrible battery power and even worst sound. I cant hear my baby crying the sound is too low. I do not recommend this camera
customer_reviews.author: HT

customer_reviews.title: Malfunction alert
customer_reviews.text: My product it’s not functioning properly. The charging plug needs to be hold to charge the camera. This is pretty awful.
customer_reviews.author: Caio Henrique Pina de Souza

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The battery worked for one hour only I thought it could work for more than ten hours at least So it’s disappointed me
customer_reviews.author: Huda Al Ghamdi

customer_reviews.title: Love how the monitor eliminates the white noise machine but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how the monitor eliminates the white noise machine but when the monitor looses signal every single night around 3am and makes a loud noise, it’s very annoying. Returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: heath

customer_reviews.title: this is very very useless, the night vision is really awful i am ...
customer_reviews.text: this is very very useless, the night vision is really awful i am going to try and send it back. my daughter paid on forth the price for one and in a dark room it looks better than this one in full daylight, do not purchase this
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Not a good monitor
customer_reviews.text: I had other monitors. This one is the worst. The image freezes every time, the sound doesn’t work anymore ( it died after 2 months), the batery doesnt last
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Smart phones disconnect
customer_reviews.text: I can only rate the camera bc I didn't receive the monitor! Smart phones disconnect.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Czeck

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to configure, and the signal is too ...
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to configure, and the signal is too low so the monitor does not work in the living room, only very close to the baby’s room... do not recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Joao Vernini

product_meta.title: Motorola MBP855CONNECT Portable 5-Inch Color Screen Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi and One Camera, White
product_meta.description: Size:1-CameraThis Motorola 5" Portable Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi enables you to keep an eye on things while at home on the handheld parent unit and away on compatible smartphones, tablets, and computers. Take the portable, battery-powered camera with you around the house to watch your little one wherever they are, and see the whole room clearly, day or night, with remote pan, tilt, and zoom and infrared night vision. The Hubble app allows you to receive sound, motion, and temperature notifications to your compatible viewing device so you can always stay connected to what’s going on at home. The ergonomic parent unit boasts a large 5” diagonal screen and two-way communication, which allows you to speak to your partner or child from another room. Motorola 5" Portable Video Baby Monitor with Wi-Fi. Watch them dream. From anywhere.
feature_bullets: Expandable Up to 4 Cameras (Sold Separately, Model: MBP88CONNECT)

Ergonomic Parent Unit with 5-Inch Diagonal Color Screen Two-Way Communication, Room Temperature Display, Infrared Night Vision, and 5 Lullabies, includes Wireless Technology: 2.4 GHz FHSS (for Local and Remote Viewing)
Portable, Rechargeable Camera with Remote Pan, Tilt, and Zoom, and High Sensitivity Microphone
Up to 1000ft Range ( Any obstruction between parent and baby units will reduce the range significantly) LED Sound Level Indicator, Out-of-Range and Low Battery Alerts
Motorola is America's #1 baby monitor brand in America (2017 revenue data).
Pairing can be affected by other devices in range, the device being used as well as any obstructions in the range of communication

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars412 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
